attributes.action: Repatriate all British citizens currently stuck in Australia due to COVID-19
attributes.additional_details:
There are thousands of British citizens who are trapped in Australia without any form of income or ways of travelling back to the UK.
Due to COVID-19, work places are not taking on staff and have let large numbers on temporary workers go. This has lead to many people being unable to financially support themselves.
Nearly all transit destinations have closed borders and flights have been cancelled.
Many are trapped due to following the FCO's disgustingly delayed and inadequate advice.
attributes.background: We want the government to act to create safe and secure travel routes for all British citizens who are stuck in Australia. Also the creation of a quarantine facility when we arrive in the UK so as to not put further strain on friends and families.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307260

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
